alert.note: Alert for Lafayette; St. Landry; St. Martin (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 9:26PM CDT until April 09 at 2:12PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Des Cannes Near Eunice Vermilion River At Lafayette, Surrey Street Gage Neches River Near Town Bluff Mermentau River Near Mermentau Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Sabine River Near Deweyville Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY SUNDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Vermilion Near Carencro. * WHEN...Until early Sunday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 18.0 feet, Roads along Bayou Fuseilier are impassable. These include but are not limited to Walnut and Green roads along the St. Martin, St. Landry Parish line, as well as Meche Road in St. Landry Parish. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 PM CDT Friday the stage was 18.6 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 8:15 PM CDT Friday was 18.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Sunday morning and continue falling to 7.7 feet Wednesday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Vermilion Carencro 17.0 18.6 Fri 8 pm CDT 17.5 15.3 12.2 &&
